prompt: create a list of 50 "message of the day" quotes formatted as an array of json objects containing the fields message and author

message.author: Steve Jobs
message.message: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.

message.author: Sam Levenson
message.message: Do not watch the clock. Do what it does. Keep going.

message.author: Henry David Thoreau
message.message: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.

message.author: Chris Grosser
message.message: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.

message.author: John D. Rockefeller
message.message: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.

message.author: Thomas Jefferson
message.message: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.

message.author: Bo Bennett
message.message: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.

message.author: Jawaharlal Nehru
message.message: Success often comes to those who dare to act.

message.author: Steve Jobs
message.message: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.

message.author: Unknown
message.message: Success is not just making money. It's making a difference.

message.author: Frank Sinatra
message.message: The best revenge is massive success.

message.author: W.P. Kinsella
message.message: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.

message.author: Walt Disney
message.message: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

message.author: Amit Abraham
message.message: Innovate, don't imitate.

message.author: Theodore Roosevelt
message.message: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

message.author: Conrad Hilton
message.message: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving.

message.author: John D. Rockefeller Jr.
message.message: The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well.

message.author: Dalai Lama
message.message: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.

message.author: Albert Schweitzer
message.message: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.

message.author: William James
message.message: It is our attitude at the beginning of a difficult task which, more than anything else, will affect its successful outcome.

message.author: Winston Churchill
message.message: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.

message.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
message.message: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Wishing is not enough; we must do.

message.author: Will Rogers
message.message: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.

message.author: Ayn Rand
message.message: The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me.

message.author: John Lennon
message.message: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.

message.author: George S. Patton
message.message: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.

message.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
message.message: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.

message.author: Shiv Khera
message.message: Your positive action combined with positive thinking results in success.

message.author: William James
message.message: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.

message.author: Michelle Obama
message.message: Success is not how much money you have, but how much difference you make.

message.author: Wayne Gretzky
message.message: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.

message.author: Abraham Lincoln
message.message: Be sure you put your feet in the right place, then stand firm.

message.author: William James
message.message: Be not afraid of life. Believe that life is worth living, and your belief will help create the fact.

message.author: C.S. Lewis
message.message: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.

message.author: Vince Lombardi
message.message: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.

message.author: Peter Drucker
message.message: The best way to predict the future is to create it.

message.author: Jordan Belfort
message.message: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself as to why you can't achieve it.

message.author: Theodore Roosevelt
message.message: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.

message.author: Amelia Earhart
message.message: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.

message.author: Walt Whitman
message.message: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.

message.author: Zig Ziglar
message.message: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.

message.author: Pablo Picasso
message.message: Action is the foundational key to all success.

message.author: Vidal Sassoon
message.message: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.

message.author: Nelson Mandela
message.message: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

message.author: Sam Levenson
message.message: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.

message.author: Muhammad Ali
message.message: Don't count the days, make the days count.

message.author: Steve Jobs
message.message: If you look really closely, most overnight successes took a long time.

message.author: Roy T. Bennett
message.message: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.

message.author: Oscar Wilde
message.message: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.

message.author: Farrah Gray
message.message: Build your own dreams, or someone else will hire you to build theirs.

message.author: George Addair
message.message: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.

message.author: Aisha Tyler
message.message: Success is not the absence of failure; it's the persistence through failure.
